flawed_nl_solution:
After one year he earns $200 in interest because 1000 x 0.2 = <<1000*0.2=200>>200
After one year it has $1,200 in the account because 1000 + 200 = <<1000+200=120>>120
He takes out $600 because 120 / 2 = <<120/2=60>>60
After this it has $600 in it because 120 - 60 = <<120-60=60>>60
She earns $90 in interest because 60 x 0.15 = <<60*0.15=9>>9
The account now has $69 because 60 + 9 = <<60+9=69>>69

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200.0, not 120.0. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
